Job_Title: Merchandising / Brand Manager - Senior Manager (New Balance / Rookie USA)
Job_Description: Key responsibilities: Responsible for managing the respective brands by providing the right products and services that meet with the market requirements, and lead the team to achieve KPI targets (Net Sales, Margin %, Inventory, Growth %, Shipment Flow) Developing and executing M-Plan/OTB budget in line with company business target, including plan the product buying every season with merchandising team, review the plan with Merchandise Planner to get the management’s approval, placing orders, and do periodic forecasting & updates Managing Category assortment with each Category-in-charge, Manage/Review Price & Margin structure, Distribution plan Maintain and Manage business relationship with Principal. Communicating, coordinating & collaborating in scope of Brand & Product performance, from buying/order selection to delivering and marketing/selling in the country on regular basis to meet expectations and mutual targets Do analysis on sales, markdown, sell through %, market trends, competitive landscape, economic condition, competitor, and customer insight. Daily/weekly manage and monitor Sales Performance, Stock, Allocation Plan, Inventory Level, and Incoming Goods and taking action when needed. M-Plan and Markdown review with the team to control future buying, margin, and ensure of sales achievement (monthly) Evaluating/monitoring implementation of existing plans according to current state of business, and adapting/adjusting/re-forecast in-season or future planning as needed in order to achieve optimum result Reviewing & providing reports and analysis for both internal and external (principal)in order to ensure that we have the right product and the right price for the consumer – pricing activities, OTB, yearly marketing plan, M-planning Working closely with other related department (marketing, visual merchandising, operation) for better coordination & arrangements. Managing Wholesale business/ E-commerce as necessary (wherever brand applicable) Qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's Degree majoring in Management Business, Economics, Merchandising, Marketing, or related field At least 5 years’ experience as Merchandiser in sports, fashion retail business is preferable Has good skills in buying, merchandising, planning and budgeting / OTB, brand management, marketing coordination, market trends, and retail system Strong in leadership, conflict management, and business orientation. Good sense of fashion, footwear and sports knowledge and market trends Organizational, Interpersonal, People skill, Business acumen, analytical skill Being accustomed to working with multiple departments and international operators Good command of English

EDUCATION Bachelor in engineering, economic, marketing and related field. EXPERIENCE • Minimum 5 years with commercial or marketing experience in petroleum or petrochemical business • Strong analytical and negotiating skills • Excellent decision making ability and problem solving skills

งานติดตามการส่งมอบสินค้า/บริการให้ถึงมือผู้รับตามระยะเวลาที่กำหนด งานตรวจสอบและติดตาม PO/WO คงค้าง งานติดตามข้อบกพร่องของสินค้า/บริการ (Discrepancy) งานบริหารผู้ขาย (Supplier Management) งานวิเคราะห์ สรรหาและคัดเลือกแหล่งผู้ขาย/ผู้ให้บริการ งานประเมินและวิเคราะห์ศักยภาพของผู้ขาย/ผู้ให้บริการรายไตรมาส งานสอบสวนและเพิกถอนผู้ขาย/ผู้ให้บริการออกจาก Vender List งานประเมินและตรวจสอบผู้ขาย/ผู้ให้บริการ ณ สถานประกอบการ งานเจรจาต่อรองให้เป็นไปตามกลยุทธ์การจัดซื้อจัดจ้าง ดำเนินงานวางแผนการเจรจาต่อรองกับผู้ขาย/ผู้ให้บริการตามกลยุทธ์การจัดซื้อจัดจ้างและนโยบาย Asset & Inventory ดำเนินงานเจรจาต่อรองกับผู้ขาย/ผู้ให้บริการตามแผนที่วางไว้ งานวิเคราะห์และจัดทำงบประมาณด้านจัดซื้อจัดจ้าง ดำเนินงานจัดทำข้อมูลและประสานงานกับผู้ใช้งบประมาณเพื่อวางแผนงบประมาณด้านจัดซื้อจัดจ้างประจำปี ดำเนินงานจัดทำสรุปผลงบประมาณด้านการจัดซื้อจัดจ้างของผู้ใช้งบประมาณรายเดือน งานจัดทำและบริหารสัญญาจัดซื้อจัดจ้าง ดำเนินการ ประสานงาน เตรียมข้อมูล นัดหมายการประชุม/พิมพ์สัญญาจัดซื้อจัดจ้าง ดำเนินงานการจัดซื้อจัดจ้างให้เป็นไปตามเงื่อนไขของสัญญาโดยประสานงานกับเจ้าของสัญญา (ระหว่างอยู่ในสัญญา) ดำเนินงานสนับสนุนข้อมูลเพื่อต่อ, สิ้นสุด หรือยกเลิกสัญญาจัดซื้อจัดจ้าง งานบริหารการจัดซื้อจัดหา Equipment / วัสดุราคาแพง ดำเนินงานเป็นคณะกรรมการการจัดซื้อจัดหา Equipment/วัสดุราคาแพง ดำเนินงานรวบรวมข้อมูลกลุ่ม Equipment/วัสดุราคาแพง ตามลักษณะธุรกิจ/นโยบาย ดำเนินงานรวบรวมกลุ่มประเภทผู้ขาย/ผู้ให้บริการที่เหมาะสมกับการจัดซื้อจัดหา Equipment/วัสดุราคาแพง ดำเนินงานการจัดซื้อจัดหา Equipment/วัสดุราคาแพง ให้เป็นไปตามนโยบายคณะทำงาน ดำเนินการงาน Equipment & Inventory Management ให้เป็นไปตามนโยบายการบริหารสินทรัพย์ งานธุรการฝ่าย ( Admin) ปฏิบัติงานระบบคุณภาพ ISO:9001 ดูแลการเบิกอุปกรณ์สำนักงาน และเครื่องมือเครื่องใช้ในฝ่ายให้มีและอยู่ในสภาพพร้อมใช้งาน ร่วมจัดทำ Strategy Plan ของงานจัดซื้อจัดจ้างประจำปี สรุปรายงานผลการปฎิบัติงานตามแผนงาน (รายงาน KPI ตามแผนงาน) ดำเนินการจัดทำเอกสารเรียกเก็บค่าบริการงานจัดซื้อจัดจ้าง คุณสมบัติประจำตำแหน่ง ปริญญาตรี การจัดการ บริหารธุรกิจ หรือสาขาอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง ประสบการณ์ (Experiences): 0-3 ปีในงานจัดซื้อจัดจ้าง สามารถบริหารเวลาและจัดการงานได้มีทักษะในการเจรจาต่อรอง ใช้โปรแกรม MS Office – Word , Excel

Job_Title: Visual Merchandiser - Aesop Bangkok, Thailand
Job_Description: For over 35 years, Aesop has carefully cultivated an inspiring and inclusive environment in wich our employees are supported and encouraged to thrive. As a global retail organisation, we offer professional development and advancement opportunities to complement career goals and aspirations. Our approach to skin care involves meticulous attention to detail, using only the most efficacious ingredients to create formulations which stir the self and senses. The same meticulous approach is taken during our recruitment process, seeking out considered and inspired individuals with a wealth of perspectives who bring out the best in themselves and others. We aim to strike the right balance between people, planet and profit, actively reducing our footprint on the planet that generously sustains us. So far, this journey has led us to become a certified B Corp. We are committed to building a more sustainable and inclusive society. Role purpose The Visual Merchandiser is responsible for managing and implementing our VM standards in all Aesop environments across Thailand from public spaces such as stores and counters to private spaces such as office, as well any occasion where Aesop Logo appears at Aesop standard. The Visual Merchandiser will need to understand and translate guidelines from HO and work out and guide solutions for successful implementations. The Visual Merchandiser will work closely with the Visual Merchandiser, SEA and Regional Visual Merchandising Managers, providing support and local understanding of the markets while understanding overall Aesop culture, values, brand and creative standards plus new opportunities to 3 dimensional executions on brand expression. Primary Accountabilities Visual Merchandising Creatively develop VM concepts in line with Global VM guidelines and implement VM displays in Aesop stores and counters as well as Aesop Thailand Office Coordinate the procurement, creation, installation and delivery of props for visual merchandising of all relevant stores and counters Responsible for the presentation of all Signature Stores, Counters and touch points across Aesop Thailand. Provide rational Visual Merchandising solutions for all Signature stores, Counters and touch points based on a clear understanding of campaign concept. Actively implement and participate in the development of Visual Merchandising solutions to support the Aesop retail environment. Implementation of displays at Aesop Signature Stores, Counters and touchpoints across Aesop Thailand. Work collaboratively with Marketing and Retail Managers to ensure the presentation of all Signature stores, Counters and touch points are aligned with company standards and guidelines. Regular interfacing/ accountability with Regional VM Manager. Coordination and supervision of any application on all surfaces represented by Aesop. Efficient undertaking of monthly Visual Merchandising related administration procedures such as Budgeting, Prop sourcing and Reporting. Coordinate and manage safe storage and reconciliation of VM props for future application aligned with company’s sustainable approach. Efficient and rational communication of VM movements, Prop rotation and Dates to all necessary parties Provide visual merchandising support for wholesale partners (e.g. stockist) and media/ customer events Customer Service To consult, serve and prescribe Aesop products to new and existing Aesop clients where required Technical Requirements (or Certification Requirements) Bachelor’s Degree in Visual Merchandising, Architecture, Fine Arts, Interior Design or equivalent Solid experience in visual merchandising, theatre design or creative industry Key Experience, Knowledge & Skills Required Able to work autonomously Good understanding of three-dimensional space Effective communication and influencing skills in both English and Thai Strong organizational skills Demonstrated experience delivering outcomes for client and making sound decisions An understanding of the Aesop ethos Aesop’s Inclusive Hiring Principles “Diversity, Equity and Inclusion is not a project. It is a way of being.” Aesop is committed to attracting, developing and retaining the very best people by offering a creative and inclusive workplace where talent is truly recognised and rewarded. We are committed to promoting inclusion for all with the belief that diversity, inclusion and belonging plays an important role in the success of our organisation. We actively encourage everyone to consider becoming a part of our journey. What’s on offer We take a holistic approach to employment, promoting professional development, career growth, employee wellbeing initiatives and encouraging deep connections with the local community through the Aesop Foundation, volunteering and matched giving programs. Employee benefits include - Flexible, hybrid working pattern Generous product discount allowance and bi-annual complimentary product allocation Bonus opportunity based on personal, and business, performance Suite of options to aid development, including complimentary access to LinkedIn Learning, in-house Product and Core skills training and study support opportunities Access to employee assistance programmes, complimentary subscription to Headspace mindfulness app and summer hours options. Aesop is committed to attracting, developing and retaining the very best people by offering a creative and inclusive workplace where talent is truly recognised and rewarded. We are committed to promoting inclusion for all with the belief that diversity, inclusion and belonging plays an important role in the success of our organisation. We actively encourage everyone to consider becoming a part of our journey.

Job_Title: Senior Packaging Material Purchasing Officer
Job_Description: คุณสมบัติของผู้ปฏิบัติงาน ( Job Specification/Qualification) ผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหารแล้ว ปริญญาตรี สาขา เทคโนโลยีการบรรจุภัณฑ์ / เศรษฐศาสตร์ / บริหารธุรกิจ /Supply Chain หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ด้านงานจัดซื้อ Packaging อย่างน้อย 3-5 ปี มีความรู้ ความชำนาญ เรื่องระบบ GMP/ HACCP/ ISO หรืออื่นๆ มีประสบการณ์ในการใช้โปรแกรม SAP สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน: อาคาร สิงห์ คอมเพล็กซ์ 1788 ถนน เพชรบุรีตัดใหม่ แขวง บางกะปิ เขต ห้วยขวาง กรุงเทพมหานคร หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ ( Job description) โดยย่อ ประสานงานกับทีมที่เกี่ยวข้อง เพื่อรับรายละเอียดจากใบขอซื้อ เช่น คุณลักษณะ ปริมาณ และระยะเวลา เพื่อให้การดำเนินการจัดทำสัญญาเป็นไปตามความต้องการของผู้รับบริการ สรรหาผู้ขายหรือผู้ให้บริการ ตามความประสงค์ของผู้รับบริการ และแนวทางหรือนโยบายของหน่วยงานจัดซื้อจัดจ้าง ซึ่งรวมถึงการกำหนดคุณลักษณะที่เหมาะสม การสำรวจตลาด การประเมิณเบื้องต้น และการขึ้นทะเบียน AVL (Approved Vendor List) เพื่อนำเสนอต่อผู้บริหารหรือหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องในการประกอบการตัดสินใจ ต่อรองราคาและการจัดทำหนังสือสัญญา ซึ่งรวมถึงการกำหนดราคา คุณภาพ ปริมาณ ระยะเวลาการจัดส่ง และข้อตกลงๆอื่น รวบรวมข้อมูลผลการประเมินผลผู้ขายหรือผู้ให้บริการจากผู้รับบริการเพื่อจัดเก็บในคลังข้อมูล ดูแลข้อมูลหลักในส่วนของการสร้างและปรับปรุงข้อมูลราคาสินค้า (Purchase Info Record) เพื่อปรับปรุงและแก้ไขข้อมูลให้เป็นปัจจุบัน วิเคราะห์ข้อมูลโดยเครื่องที่มีอยู่ เพื่อให้ได้มาซึ่งข้อมูลเชิงลึกในการนำไปใช้วางแผนหรือแนวทางการพัฒนาการจัดซื้อจัดจ้างต่อไป ติดต่อประสานงานกับผู้ให้บริการ เพื่อแนะนำแนวทางการพัฒนาธุรกิจ (หากมี) ซึ่งรวมถึงการระบุและชี้นำ และการใหข้อเสนอแนะเอผลักดันการพัฒนาอย่างยั่งยืนของผู้ให้บริการ สร้าง และบริหารจัดการความสัมพันธ์กับผู้ให้บริการ เพื่อให้เกิดความสัมพันธ์ที่แน่นแฟ้นและเป็นประโยชน์ต่อบริษัท ปฏิบัติงานอื่นๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย

Job_Title: Supply Planning Associate/Supply Planning Associate
Job_Description: Job Responsibility • Plan and control finished goods inventory to optimize level of inventory, meet customer demands and minimize stock-out. • Monitor finished goods inventory, analyze sales, and prepare loading forecast & plan for production and logistics teams. • Monitor and recommend adjustments to production schedule and inventory targets based on changes in demand and impacts on supply costs. • Analyze sales and manage inventory level and age of assigned product group to achieve the stock freshness and FEFO management. • Coordinate with relevant parties; productions, logistics, sales, marketing and agents to improve product freshness and inventory accuracy. Job Qualification • Bachelor's/ Master's Degree in Accounting, Finance, Logistics Engineering, Supply Chain Management, or other related fields • Minimum 3 years experience in Distribution Center/ Warehouse/ Supply Chain & Logistics Management preferably within FMCG/ Beverage industry • Strong Analytical, Planning & Organizing, Information Systems and Problem Solving Skills • Understand logistics, inventory management, and production planning concepts • Understand logistics operation and sales operation. • Very good computer skill (MS Excel and PowerPoint) • Good command of Thai and English language (spoken and written)

Job_Title: Supply Chain Coordinator and International Purchasing
Job_Description: Job Descriptions and Responsibilities: Supply Chain Coordinator will coordinate any key features between suppliers and customers such as orders and information. Purchase and negotiate with supplier for the best contract regarding policy, quality, price, payment terms and delivery speed. Monitor all supply chain loop including import and export processes such as on time delivery, import and export documents, cost calculation, expense management and contracts. Manage stock levels and demands of products by establishing constant communication and forecasting with Sales & Marketing and suppliers. Identify problematic and liaison with related parties to solve the issue for the assigned products line. Organize oversea shipment by adhering to import and export government laws and licensing regulations. Co-ordinate with suppliers in sales, marketing activities and customers’ requirement. Handling supplier database and related administration service. Search for information related to supply chain. Other jobs related to supply chain. Qualifications: Minimum Bachelor’s Degree in related field preferably in Sciences or related with logistics. At least 3-5 years of working experience in material planning, logistics, supply chain, oversea purchasing Excellent verbal and written English communication and negotiation, TOEIC score should be at least 650. Good at mathematical, calculation and costing. Logical, systematic, problem solving and decision making skills. Computer literacy in Microsoft Office especially in Excel, Internet applications and related programs. Able to perform teamwork and work well under pressure and able to perform detailed and multi-tasks.

Job_Title: Procurement and Import - Export Manager/ผู้จัดการฝ่ายจัดหาจัดจ้างและนำเข้า -...
Job_Description: Job Discription Regularly review and evaluate existing vendors and contracts including renew or seek more competitive ones from the market to ensure TPBI gets the best deals Install sourcing process and procedures which are applicable and effective without compromising transparency and compliance Lead, champion and improve all steps within the strategic sourcing process towards effective and lean operations as well as seamless to other related functions Analyze spending and formulate sourcing strategy and action plan for senior management’s approval prior to implementation Initiate and execute cost saving programs Make sourcing decisions (according to DoA guideline) based on cost and scenario analysis as well as market trends Negotiate contracts with key suppliers for better deal such as cost, lead time, terms, service, quality, etc. Collaborate with the procurement department to identify and pursue new supplier opportunities Follow market trend, movement and research for better forecast and strategic decision including propose back up plan to management team if needed Harmonize terms and conditions of vendors and contracts Optimize numbers of suppliers, SKUs, contracts to gain scale and bargaining power as well as reduce complexity Support development of project plans, deliverables, metrics, and milestones for associated projects Collaborates with key partners to deploy effectively strategic sourcing strategies for selected spends or categories Maintain strategic sourcing relationships and develop strong partnership with all stakeholders Monitor of the shipments to ensure the compliance of regulations Lead and champion all steps within the strategic import-export process, searching for possibilities to reduce taxes and freight cost Manage a team of Import-Export, Shipping & Forwarder Agents and responsible for Import-Export declaration at customs formality management Prepare and submit a goods declearation and all customs compliance - Certificates of Origin, Bills of Lading, Commercial Invoices, Packing Lists and FTA Forms Monitor and Control of the tax incentives usage related to the Customs Deparment such as Tax Examption,  Tax compensation, Reduction of Import Duty Drawback and other Duty Privilege on raw materials / machinery (Section 29 under investment promotion act B.E.2520 and its revision) Any other jobs or projects assigned by the superior Qualification Bachelor or Master degree in Business, Economics, Finance, Logistics, or in a related fields Able to influence internal and external partners Capable of leading, directing, and developing others Capable of working effectively in multi-disciplinary teams Demonstrate ability to self-start, determining work steps based upon management direction

Job_Title: Procurement Specialist
Job_Description: Do you have a passion for sourcing captivating print and promotional materials? We're seeking a creative and detail-oriented Print and Promotional Items Procurement specialist to lead our efforts in managing print projects and promotional merchandise. Key Responsibilities: Print Management: Initiate competitive supplier bids, source new suppliers, and collaborate with vendors to ensure the timely delivery of high-quality marketing collateral, brochures, and various printed materials. Promotional Items Oversight: Manage the sourcing, procurement, and distribution of promotional merchandise, aligning with specific client requirements. Vendor Relationship Development: Establish and nurture strong relationships with suppliers and vendors, adeptly negotiating contracts and pricing for cost-effectiveness. Inventory Control: Monitor and regulate promotional item inventory levels, meticulously tracking usage and initiating reorders to fortify marketing strategies. Quality Assurance: Conduct comprehensive quality checks on printed materials and promotional items, consistently maintaining high levels of customer satisfaction. Collaboration: Work closely with internal and customer service teams to ensure seamless operations. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field Proven experience 5 years in print management, procurement, or a similar role Strong project management skills, adept at handling multiple projects concurrently Exceptional communication and negotiation abilities, fluent in both English and Chinese. Proficiency in MS Office Suite and familiarity with print production software/tools Attention to detail coupled with a creative mindset If you're passionate about crafting visually compelling print and promotional materials, we're excited to hear more about your experiences! Please share your resume and a cover letter highlighting your relevant expertise and how you would be an invaluable addition to our team. PMG Integrated Communications (Thailand) Co., Ltd. 152 Chartered Square Building, 18th Floor, Unit 18 - 05 North Sathon Road, Silom, Bangrak, Bangkok, 10500 Website : www.pmgasia.com [link removed]

Job_Title: Assistant Sales & Operations Manager - Fresh TH
Job_Description: At Fresh, we create beauty products that perform with experiences that transform. Born in Boston, Raised in New York. What began as a small collection in a neighborhood shop by our founders Lev & Alina, has evolved into a full lifestyle line of skincare, lip care, bodycare, and fragrance sold all over the world. The sensoriality of our products—their textures and scents—sets us apart. It’s this combination of high efficacy and amazing sensations that we’re known for, and why those who know us love us. Lev says fresh creates products people don’t know they need—and then can’t live without. Our founders still work with the brand every day to fulfill their original dream of making beauty that performs and transforms. We are driven by our never complacent indie spirit where the sky's the limit. This approach is initiated by Lev and Alina and lived by the entire organization. Our boundless curiosity fuels our search for the extraordinary, whether it’s a moment of pleasure in nature or an experience of generosity in our shops. Where fresh goes, beauty follows. We’re pioneers—in product, in experience, in culture, and in process. We believe that fresh is more than what it sells; it’s the emotional connection to the brand that we call the sixth sense. It’s the heartfelt experience we craft for our people and our guests. Fresh is a brand of LVMH group worldwide. In SEA, it is managed through LBeauty Pte Ltd, a joint venture between LVMH group and Luxasia. We are looking for an engaged, motivated Assistant Manager, Sales & Operations seeking to build a successful career in sales. The role will be driving  our fast-growing Thailand and SEA business. In this role, reporting to the Sales & Retail Manager-TH and Director, Sales & Retail SEAO, you will be part of the Thailand Sales & Retail organization to drive, manage and ensure a smooth sales and retail operations. You’ll help us establish and manage sales and inventory processes, measure success and partner closely with our retail team, other functional teams and external trade partners. Job Description Manage the Product, Channel & Stock Planning: Lead the full sales & stock planning process of Thailand. Drive the achievement of the retail and net sales budgets (sell-in & returns) based on accurate forecasting and planning. Partner with retailers to communicate, manage and negotiate sell-in to be timely to meet monthly net sales achievement and meet launch timings Support the net sales management through effective reporting and communication to the internal team and business control. Manage and support the fulfilment need of trade and retail for ad-hoc transfers and delivery planning when necessary. Manages the day-to-day operations Digital Channel to ensure accuracy, sales and inventory planning. Participate in the definition of the sales planning (Forecasting rounds, retailer targets etc.) Manage the product allocation process in conjunction with Thailand and all members of the Regional Team responsible for allocation Manage and monitor the planning and ordering of products (newness, seasonal, animation activations and regulars) by the trade EDIs and retail team, in conjunction with marketing and sales Partner with regional fulfilment team to manage the inventory demand ordering and inbound to Thailand to ensure it supports sales and marketing need. Analyze and manage inventory holdings for all channels including warehouse at healthy level, including slow moving and obsolete. Manage the product registration process of Thailand. Sales & Trade Campaigns Management Drive and manage the trade and retail animation process from sales, inventory planning and operations. Support compliance in trade returns process and ensure the budget tracking and management. Partner with retail team to ensure smooth operations of documentation, audit, testers and SOPs are observed. To be the face of fresh to the trade partners to build strong rapport, partnership and relationship. Creation of presentations, analysis and back up data, to aid sales strategy, and for Sales Reviews, FLM meetings, Board Working with the Sales team articulating and developing appropriate Sales/Market Business Intelligence data Ensure best practice learning from across the brand is incorporated within the regional approach Support event operations and other sales operations where necessary. Job Requirements With a Degree in Business Management or equivalent With at least 3 relevant of working experience in sales for Retail, FMCG, Sales or Beauty. A driven, hands-on self-starter with a curious analytical mind A positive, passionate team player with a “can-do” attitude. Business minded and possess a good problem-solving skills and motivation Well organized and committed to accuracy at all levels of details Excellent communication skills in oral and written with strong people skills. Experience in and enjoys operating in a fast-paced environment Experience in working with departmental store retailer network will be a plus. Strong in Excel and Powerpoint.

Job_Title: Director of Procurement
Company: S Hotels & Resorts Public Company Limited
Job_Description: JOB OVERVIEW A Director of Procurement has the responsibility for the overall procurement function of company’s self-managed properties purchasing function, leading on all procurement efforts to efficiently and effectively maximize value throughout the supply chain. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: Oversee all procurement activities of the company’s self-managed properties and headquarter to ensure its effectiveness, efficiency as well as adherence to all relevant regulations, industry best practice frameworks and good corporate governance principles applicable for SET listed companies. Develop, enhance and maintain procurement strategies, standard of practices and execution plans to achieve corporate goals and strategic plans. Conduct group volume bidding, Group agreement of strategic products and services. Liaise with property’s GMs, Head of Financial Controllers and Purchasing Managers to align corporate procurement strategies with property’s inventory management, vendor sourcing & selection, negotiation and related purchasing functions. Develop collaborative long-term partnerships with suppliers, contractors and outsourced service providers to improve cost efficiency,  meet legislative requirements and achieve high quality outcomes. Ensure all approved purchase requisitions are processed in timely manner and recommend the most appropriate method of procurement. Confer with vendors and suppliers (local, regional and international sources) to obtain product or service information such as price, availability and delivery schedule. Also obtain estimate value of goods and services through multiple quotations from reliable and competitive suppliers. Verify detailed tender specifications and performance standards with the program and the operations teams to facilitate procurement of equipment, goods and services in strict compliance with the approved policy as well as the relevant donor requirements. Organize procurement selection meetings to consider tender applications against approved technical specifications and with due regard to market price, cost, quality and speed of delivery as well as economy of operations. Prepare purchase orders, obtaining authorized signatures and forward procurement documents to the Operations Finance Department for payment processing. Follow up with suppliers and vendors and evaluate the delivery of approved supplies. Ensure that the program is requesting and receiving customs exemptions for international procurements, where appropriate and applicable. Establish, enhance and maintain competent procurement teams at headquarter and each of the company’s properties necessary to achieve short, medium and long-term corporate goals. KEY REQUIREMENTS Bachelor’s degree in business management or similar relevant fields. Minimum 4-5 years of experience as a procurement head with international hotel/resort operator at Cluster, Regional or head quarter level. Experience in conducting group bidding of OSE, and group agreement of product and service. Excellent analytical, problem-solving skills with attention to details. Strong leadership and management skills. Ability to multi-task in a high paced environment. Expert knowledge of procurement tools&techniques. Proficient in MS Office and relevant procurement software. Excellent communication and presentation skills written and oral. Good command of verbal and written Thai & English. Assertive with strong negotiation skills.

Develop and manage suppliers according to business needs and maintain day-to-day supplier relationships; act as the lead point of contact for commercial discussion. Issue RFXs for sourcing assigned commodities, review raised purchase requests and support/lead a strategic sourcing approval process. Provide guidance to internal stakeholders on procurement principles, policies and processes. Job_Title: Fashion Stylist
Job_Description: Born from innovation, Burberry is a global luxury brand with a rich British heritage. Founded in 1856, our brand is underpinned by our founder’s passion for the outdoors. Job_Title: Supervisor (Phuket)
Job_Description: INTRODUCTION Born from innovation, Burberry is a global luxury brand with a rich British heritage. Founded in 1856, our brand is underpinned by our founder’s passion for the outdoors. Thomas Burberry invented the innovative rain-ready fabric gabardine to protect explorers from the elements. In doing so, he created the foundation for the iconic Burberry trench coat, which remains core to the business even today. Guided by our history of exploration and our shared belief that ‘creativity open spaces’, our purpose is to unlock the power of imagination to push boundaries and open new possibilities for our people, our customers and our communities. As a values-driven brand, we are committed to creating the next generation of sustainable luxury and believe that diversity, equity and inclusion are essential to fulfilling our purpose. Fostering an inclusive culture where differences are valued and embraced enables us to be more creative, engaged and make a more meaningful contribution to the world around us. To discover more about our brand values, visit Burberryplc.com JOB PURPOSE Daily floor supervision of sales team ensuring great customer experiences and thereby driving sales goal attainment and providing real-time performance coaching to drive the overall Burberry Experience. RESPONSIBILITIES Supervise, assist and motivate sales associates to consistently deliver high-value experiences on the selling floor to every client; act as a “quality control” supervisor ensuring that every interaction with a customer is memorable. Partner with associates to improve overall selling skills and close sales in order to achieve sales goals and KPIs Lead a high performing customer facing and service orientated team. Coach and provide feedback to the team as necessary to ensure all customers serviced in the store are given the full Burberry Experience in line with brand strategies. Manage the customer flow to ensure the best possible service and that no client is left unattended. Set the pace and standard to deliver excellent service to customers Drive partnership on the selling floor between sales associates, specialists, stock associates and operations team Coach “in the moment” and after every transaction and client interaction, reach out to associates to talk through the successes and opportunities and ensure proper follow-through on follow up actions. Develop and retain talented employees, by recognising and rewarding performance through monthly development plans and annual performance reviews. Lead by example by delivering the Burberry Experience to customers when necessary. Partner with GM, SM and S&P to take ownership of Burberry Experience training within the store. Use morning and weekly meetings to constantly reinforce key elements of the Burberry Experience through role-play, providing tips and talking through difficulties of individual associates. Partner with store management to set goal expectations. Deliver formal performance feedback in partnership with store management through monthly Burberry Experience Development Plans. Resolve difficult customer issues and escalate to management when necessary. In absence of store management, responsible for processing post-void transactions, authorising promotional discounts and employee sales Drive the digital experience in store and use digital resources to communicate whenever face-to-face is not possible. Hold a good understanding of the business and effectively communicate needs and ideas to bring the business to next level. Possess a thorough understanding of company policies and procedures and consistently follow and enforce company guidelines on operations. Assist with the opening and closing of store which includes securing doors, windows and merchandise, successful alarming of store and POS procedures Additional duties as required. PERSONAL PROFILE Advanced knowledge of POS system. Previous experience with Apple mobile devices and comfortable with the use of digital tools. 1-2 years previous supervisory or management experience in retail sales FOOTER Burberry is an Equal Opportunities Employer and as such, treats all applications equally and recruits purely on the basis of skills and experience.

Job_Title: Purchasing Manager for Quick Service Restaurant (QSR)
Job_Description: Position: Purchasing Manager Location: Head Office Job Type: Full-Time Job Summary: As a Purchasing Manager in the Quick Service Restaurant (QSR) business, you will be responsible for overseeing all aspects of procurement and supply chain management. Your primary goal will be to ensure the efficient sourcing, purchasing, and delivery of high-quality products and ingredients while maintaining cost-effectiveness and supplier relationships. Key Responsibilities: Procurement and Vendor Management: Identify, evaluate, and select suppliers for food and non-food items. Negotiate supplier contracts and agreements to secure favorable terms. Manage relationships with suppliers, ensuring quality and timely deliveries. Continuously evaluate supplier performance and assess their compliance with quality and cost standards. Cost Control: Develop and implement strategies to optimize costs while maintaining product quality. Monitor market trends and prices to make informed purchasing decisions. Control inventory levels to minimize waste and stock holding costs. Inventory Management: Maintain an efficient and well-organized inventory system. Conduct regular stock audits and reconcile any discrepancies. Ensure appropriate stock levels to meet operational demands while avoiding overstocking. Quality Assurance: Work closely with quality control teams to ensure all purchased products meet quality and safety standards. Implement quality improvement initiatives as needed. Forecasting and Planning: Collaborate with other departments to develop accurate demand forecasts. Create and maintain a purchasing plan to meet operational needs and business growth. Compliance: Ensure compliance with all relevant regulations and industry standards. Stay up to date with changing regulations and make necessary adjustments. Team Leadership: Lead and motivate the purchasing team. Provide training and development opportunities for team members. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business, supply chain management, or related field (Master's degree is a plus). Proven experience as a Purchasing Manager more than 7 years in the QSR industry. Strong negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills. Proficient in procurement software and Microsoft Office applications. Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities. Strong organizational and multitasking skills. Knowledge of food safety and quality standards. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment. The role of a Purchasing Manager in the Quick Service Restaurant (QSR) business is crucial in ensuring the consistent and cost-effective supply of goods necessary for the operation of the business. This job description provides a clear outline of the responsibilities and qualifications required for this role.

Job_Title: Sales Associate (Bangkok)
Job_Description: WHY WORK FOR VERSACE Our stores fully embody the spirit of Versace: Italian heritage, fearlessly Luxury forward, iconic design and a family first culture where we believe in the empowerment, motivation and growth of all employees. Founded in 1978, Versace is one of the leading global fashion design houses. Under the Artistic Direction of Donatella Versace since 1997, Versace designs, manufactures and distributes fashion and lifestyle products including haute couture, women and men RTW, accessories and fragrances. Since 2019 Versace is part of Capri Holdings global fashion luxury group - an equal opportunity employer committed to inclusivity, highly involved in improving the impact on the environment: starting from Versace, all Capri brands are constantly looking at all aspects of their business in a responsible way. WHO YOU ARE Our contributors at Versace are stylish, fashionable and elevated individuals who have a drive to achieve results and a passion for customer engagement.  Success starts with being an entrepreneur- by acting as a strong brand representative in the community you will grow your business through client relationship management and events. We encourage an innovative workplace to strategically drive the business by being solution oriented. WHAT YOU WILL DO The Senior Sales Associate will join our team reporting to the Store Manager. You will build relationship with customers and maximize sales opportunity, whilst maintaining store standards in terms of image, product and operations, and delivering the Versace customer experience. Business Development & Client Management Partner with management team to strategically achieve sales targets Strive to always increase brand and product knowledge Master selling skills to satisfy customer needs Take action to maximize the sales opportunity on all categories Embrace and promote our Retail Excellence Program with both clients and staff Build strong partnerships with clients, peers, and management through effective communication Ensure superlative customer service standards, to meet customer expectations Act as brand ambassador to build relationships with new customers and VIP clientele Deliver the ultimate Versace experience to increase customer loyalty Drive results through delivering an elevated customer experience both during and after sale service CRM Capture customer data all the time Proactively take possible actions to maintain a long-term relationship with customers Participate in the organization of In-store & Promotional events Implement and manage the boutique’s community outreach program to maintain active social relationships with clients Operations Ensure the stock and the backroom are effectively managed and operational duties are met (goods receiving, transferring, stock take, stock arrangement, reporting etc. Ensure store presentation and visual merchandising standards are maintained according to company directives and participate to VM set-up Remain in compliance with operational and company policies and procedures YOU’LL NEED TO HAVE 3 + years’ experience in luxury retail Computer skills to include operation of retail sales system, Word, Excel and email WE’D LOVE TO SEE An entrepreneur with the ability to drive results Well connected with a strong ability to engage Elevated customer service skills; a true fashion expert with a passion for sales Exceptional verbal and written communication skills A positive, outgoing, high-energy personality able to thrive within a high paced environment

Job_Title: Store Manager - Aesop Bangkok, Thailand
Job_Description: For over 35 years, Aesop has carefully cultivated an inspiring and inclusive environment in which our employees are supported and encouraged to thrive. As a global retail organisation, we offer professional development and advancement opportunities to complement career goals and aspirations. Our approach to skin care involves meticulous attention to detail, using only the most efficacious ingredients to create formulations which stir the self and senses. The same meticulous approach is taken during our recruitment process, seeking out considered and inspired individuals with a wealth of perspectives who bring out the best in themselves and others. We aim to strike the right balance between people, planet and profit, actively reducing our footprint on the planet that generously sustains us. So far, this journey has led us to become a certified B Corp. We are committed to building a more sustainable and inclusive society. Role purpose As a Store Manager, you embody our desire to engage, listen and guide customers to products that are relevant to them. Through passionate and focused leadership, you will motivate and develop your team to create memorable, inclusive customer experiences that drive overall store performance. Working full-time on-site, including some weekend working, you will be responsible for budgeting, store-specific marketing, and building the store’s client base, as well as choreographing the daily activities of a team of Retail Consultants. The successful candidate will be a skilled professional, able to grace this role with diligence, passion, and an unwavering commitment to excellence. What we are looking for Management experience within customer service environment Proven track record of effective selling skills and ability to drive commercial outcomes History of successfully leading and coaching a team, creating an inclusive and psychologically safe work environment Demonstrated ability to utilise empathy to manage interpersonal relationships Open mindset and deep curiosity seeking to understand others, listen without judgement and act on diverse perspectives Strong communication, problem-solving, commercial acumen and merchandising skills Working knowledge of skin care and skin care industry (advantageous) Knowledge of hair care, body care, fragrance and home categories (advantageous) Computer literacy encompassing strong familiarity with Microsoft Office suite What’s on offer We take a holistic approach to employment, promoting professional development, career growth, employee wellbeing initiatives and encouraging deep connections with the local community through the Aesop Foundation, volunteering and matched giving programs. Employee benefits include - Competitive annual leave entitlements, medical and insurances coverages Generous product discount allowance and bi-annual complimentary product allocation Bonus opportunity based on personal, and business, performance Suite of options to aid development, including complimentary access to LinkedIn Learning, in-house Product and Core skills training and study support opportunities Access to employee assistance programmes, complimentary subscription to Headspace mindfulness app and summer wellness leave options. Aesop is committed to attracting, developing and retaining the very best people by offering a creative and inclusive workplace where talent is truly recognised and rewarded. We are committed to promoting inclusion for all with the belief that diversity, inclusion and belonging plays an important role in the success of our organisation. We actively encourage everyone to consider becoming a part of our journey.

Job_Title: Purchasing Supervisor
Job_Description: Purchasing Supervisor – Rayong, Thailand Come Make the World With Us It takes great people to achieve greatness. People with a sense of purpose and integrity. People with a relentless pursuit of excellence. People who care about making things better For Those Who Make The World™. Sound like you? Join our top-notch team of nearly 60,000 professionals globally who are making their mark on some of the world’s most beloved brands, including DEWALT®, CRAFTSMAN®, CUB CADET®, STANLEY® and BLACK+DECKER® What You’ll Do As a Purchasing Supervisor, your role is pivotal in managing the procurement and purchasing processes for Direct Materials (DM), metal products, Finished Goods (FG) trading, subcontracting, and tooling. Reporting to the Purchasing Manager, you will be responsible for sourcing suppliers, negotiating contracts, monitoring supplier performance, and ensuring the timely delivery of goods. Your expertise in supplier relationship management, cost-saving initiatives, and adherence to quality standards will contribute to the success of the purchasing function. Key Responsibilities: Procurement and Sourcing: Source suppliers for new products/projects, including identifying alternative sources for existing goods. Follow up Requests for Quotations (RFQs) and analyze quotations before submitting them to the costing department. Negotiation and Order Management: Negotiate with suppliers for pricing, lead time, payment terms, and commercial conditions. Monitor and update new projects/models to align with customer timelines and requirements. Release necessary order quantities of Finished Goods, Subcon, etc., based on master planning and Material Requirements Planning (MRP). Supply Chain Monitoring: Monitor and expedite supplier deliveries as planned to avoid any shortage of supply to customers. Manage relationships with suppliers and conduct performance assessments for quality, delivery, service, and cost. Cost Management and Optimization: Implement cost-saving initiatives and productivity improvements. Monitor and control inventory levels, safety inventory, and stock optimization. Quality and Claim Management: Work with Quality Assurance (QA) and related departments regarding claim issues. Facilitate supplier development and conduct supplier audits. Attend customer audits related to the purchasing function. Compliance and Standards: Follow the company’s rules and procedures professionally and ethically. Follow requirements and actively participate in supporting activities of ISO9001:2015, IATF16949:2016, ISO14001:2015, and ISO45001:2018. Other Responsibilities: Perform tasks as assigned by superiors. Who You Are You always strive to do a good job…but wouldn’t it be great if you could do your job and do a world of good? You care about quality – at every level. You love to learn and grow and be acknowledged for your valuable contributions. You’re not intimidated by innovation. In fact, you embrace it. You also have: Qualifications and Skills: Bachelor's degree in Business, Supply Chain Management, or a related field. Proven experience in purchasing and procurement, preferably in a manufacturing or automotive environment. Strong negotiation skills and the ability to analyze and compare supplier quotations. Familiarity with MRP systems and supply chain management principles. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for effective collaboration with suppliers and internal teams. Knowledge of quality standards and experience in managing supplier performance. A proactive approach to problem-solving and continuous improvement. Strong organizational and time management skills. Familiarity with ISO standards and commitment to compliance. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Proficient in Microsoft Office applications. Willingness to adapt to changing priorities and meet deadlines. How You’ll Feel We want our company to be a place you’ll want to be – and stay. Being part of our team means you’ll get to: Grow: Be part of our global company with 20+ brands to grow and develop your skills along multiple career paths. Learn: Have access to a wealth of learning resources, including our Lean Academy, Coursera® and online university. Belong: Experience an awesome place to work, where we have mutual respect and a great appreciation for diversity, equity and inclusion. Give Back: Help us continue to make positive changes locally and globally through volunteerism, giving back and sustainable business practices. What’s more, you’ll get that pride that comes from empowering makers, doers, protectors and everyday heroes all over the world. We’re more than the #1 tools company. More than a driving force in outdoor power equipment. More than a global leader in industrial. We’re visionaries and innovators. As successful as we’ve been in the past, we have so much further to go. That’s where you come in. Join us!

สร้างจิตวิญญาณในการขายให้เกิดขึ้นแก่ทีมขาย บริหารสินค้าหน้าร้าน และสต๊อกให้มีการเคลื่อนไหวอย่างเหมาะสม ตรวจสอบระดับสินค้าคงคลัง,ผลักดันยอดขายสำหรับ SKUs เก่า หรือ SKUs ที่จำหน่ายได้น้อย เพื่อรักษาสมดุลของสินค้าคงคลังให้ดีและมีความเหมาะสม ติดตามดูแลการเบิกจ่าย การเงิน และบัญชีให้มีความถูกต้องตามนโยบายของบริษัท วางแผน เตรียมงาน และควบคุมดูแลการเปิดสาขาใหม่ ดูแลกำลังคน การประเมินผลงาน การพิจารณาโยกย้าย-แต่งตั้ง การพัฒนาและแก้ไขผลการปฏิบัติงานของพนักงานในทีม ประสานงานกับทุกฝ่ายที่เกี่ยวข้องเพื่อให้งานดำเนินไปตามแผน และแก้ไขปัญหาต่างๆ ที่เกี่ยวกับการขาย การบริการ ลูกค้า ร้าน ห้างฯ สินค้า และพนักงาน ให้เกิดผลดีมากที่สุด สนับสนุนความรู้ การพัฒนาและการอบรมของพนักงานขาย คุณสมบัติของตำแหน่ง :- วุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรีขึ้นไปทุกสาขาวิชา ประสบการณ์ทำงานตำแหน่ง ผู้จัดการสาขา หรือผู้จัดการเขต ในธุรกิจค้าปลีกอย่างหนึ่งอย่างใด เช่น ร้าน Mobile phone, Gadget, IoT Products and SIM card in retail shop, wholesale หรือ e-commerce โดยมีประสบการณ์ 5 ปีขึ้นไป ผ่านงานในระดับหัวหน้างานที่บริหารเขตขาย หรือดูแลร้านค้าปลีกหลายๆ สาขา มาไม่น้อยกว่า 2 ปี จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ ประสบการณ์ในการจัดการและคุมมาตราฐานการดำเนินงานและสามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้อย่างดี เป็นนักวางแผน ปฏิบัติ ติดตาม ตรวจสอบ และควบคุมงาน มีความเป็นผู้นำ กระตือรือล้น มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์, บุคคลิกภาพดีและรักความท้าทาย ทัศนคติบวกและมีความสามารถในการสื่อสารที่ดี สร้างแรงกระตุ้น จูงใจให้แก่ทีมงานได้ มีวินัยในการทำงานสูง และมุ่งเน้นผลสำเร็จของงาน มีความชำนาญในทักษะการคิดวิเคราะห์เชิงปริมาณ และ การคิดวิเคราะห์อย่างเป็นระบบ มีวุฒิภาวะ และภาวะผู้นำสูง มนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี มีความสามารถในการสื่อสาร สามารถปกครองทีมงานขนาดใหญ่ได้ มีความทันสมัย เรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆได้เร็ว มีความชื่นชอบในเทคโนโลยี การใช้งานแอพพลิเคชั่นต่างๆ สามารถใช้คอมพิวเตอร์ได้คล่อง ด้วย MS Office (MS Word, MS Excel) และใช้ Internet /Email ได้ดี สามารถเดินทางไปตรวจสาขาในภาคต่างๆ อย่างน้อย 14 วัน ต่อเดือน และ สามารถเดินทางมาประชุมที่กรุงเทพฯ สำนักงานใหญ่อย่างน้อย  5 วัน ต่อเดือนได้ มียานพาหนะส่วนตัว และใบขับขี่

Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in accounting, management or relevant field is preferred. At least 5 years of experience in the field of procurement or in a related. Good command in English. Good skills in service-minded, Problem-solving, Positive thinking. Proficiency in using MS Office.

หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง หากมีประสบการณ์ในการจัดซื้อวัตถุดิบ 1-2 ปีขึ้นไปจะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีความเข้าใจในหลักการและแนวทางการจัดซื้อวัตถุดิบอย่างถ่องแท้ Job_Title: Sales Associate (Nakhon Sawan & Bangkok 10 Positions )/พนักงานขาย
Job_Description: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบหลัก รับผิดชอบบริหาร การดำเนินงานภายในร้านทุกวัน ให้บริการลูกค้าที่เป็นเลิศและรักษาสภาพแวดล้อมในการช็อปปิ้งที่น่าพึงพอใจซึ่งสอดคล้องกับภาพลักษณ์ของแบรนด์ของเรา โทรหาลูกค้าปัจจุบันและลูกค้าเป้าหมายเพื่อสร้างและรักษาความสัมพันธ์กับลูกค้า แจ้งให้ลูกค้าทราบเกี่ยวกับผลิตภัณฑ์หรือบริการใหม่ การเปลี่ยนแปลง ฯลฯ วิเคราะห์ปัญหา และจัดการข้อซักถามและข้อกังวลใจของลูกค้า ดำเนินการตามแผนการขายและเข้าร่วมกิจกรรมทางการตลาดและโปรแกรมส่งเสริมการขาย มีการสื่อสาร ข้อเสนอแนะที่รวบรวมผ่านกิจกรรมภายในร้านเพื่อส่งรายงานให้ทีมการจัดการร้านค้า หน้าที่อื่นๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ มีประสบการณ์ด้านพนักงานขาย 3 ปีขึ้นไป เน้นด้านแฟชั่น สกินแคร์ น้ำหอม นาฬิกา มีความหลงใหลในธุรกิจค้าปลีกluxury brand และ มีทักษะในการขายที่ดี ชื่นชอบงานแฟชั่นและชื่นชมสินค้าที่มีคุณภาพ สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ดีมาก หรือหากได้ภาษาจีนจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถทำงานเป็นทีม มี service mind มีบุคคลิกภาพดี และมีทักษะในการสื่อสารยอดเยี่ยม มีทักษะการใช้คอมพิวเตอร์ขั้นต้นได้ Excel, word, Microsoft team Samsonite (Thailand) Co., Ltd. 98 Sathorn Square Office Tower, 37 th Floor, Unit 3705-3706 , North Sathorn Road, Silom, Bangrak10500 Feel free to visit our company website at www.samsonite.co.th for more information.

Job_Title: Key Account Manager/Assistance Manager
Job_Description: Company Overview: We are a dynamic, fast-paced company operating in the retail industry, specifically within LZD and SHP. As a Key Account Manager, you will act as an entrepreneur within the organization, overseeing various aspects from merchandising, operations, advertisements, communications, customer services, creative direction, and negotiation with platform key accounts. Responsibilities: -Merchandising: Curate and manage product assortment, collaborate with the merchandising team to optimize product offerings, and ensure inventory levels meet demands. -Operations: Streamline operational processes, manage logistics, and ensure timely delivery of products while maintaining quality standards. -Creative Direction: Work closely with creative teams to develop engaging and impactful artwork that resonates with the brand's vision and audience. -Ads and Communication: Develop effective advertising strategies, collaborate with marketing teams, and ensure consistent brand communication across all platforms. -Key Account Negotiation: Cultivate and maintain relationships with platform key accounts, negotiate contracts and terms to secure the best deals and support for the brand. -Customer Services: Oversee customer service operations, resolve escalated issues, and implement strategies to enhance customer satisfaction and loyalty. Requirements: -Active and Energetic: Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, maintain high energy levels, and drive enthusiasm among team members. -Creativity and Proactiveness: Demonstrate innovative thinking, propose new ideas, and take proactive steps to address challenges and opportunities. -Willingness to Learn: Eagerness to constantly learn and adapt to new trends, technologies, and industry developments. -Self-Improvement: Motivated to enhance personal skills and capabilities continually, open to feedback, and actively seeking self-improvement opportunities. -Sales Excellence: Proven track record in sales, ability to strategize and meet sales targets, with a dedication that reflects passion and commitment for the role. -Strong Negotiation Skills: Ability to negotiate effectively with platform key accounts to secure advantageous deals and support for the brand. Qualifications: -Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field. -2-3 years of experience in a similar role within the retail industry, specifically LZD and SHP. -Strong leadership and interpersonal skills. -Excellent communication and negotiation abilities. -Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite. -Additional Information: The ideal candidate will possess a passion for driving growth, managing diverse responsibilities, and embracing challenges as opportunities for growth. They should be a resilient self-starter who not only excels in a team environment but can also work autonomously. Note: We encourage applications from candidates who possess the described qualities and are passionate about contributing to the success of our retail endeavors at LZD and SHP *** Requested flent in Thai ***

Job_Title: Beauty Advisor ( The History of Whoo )
Job_Description: รายละเอียดงาน ดูแลพื้นที่ก่อนขาย และจัดเตรียมสินค้าให้พร้อมสำหรับการขาย เช่น ความสะอาด สต๊อคสินค้า ดูแลจัดเรียงสินค้า เตรียมพร้อมข้อมูลสินค้าที่จะนำเสนอขายสินค้า แนะนำสินค้า ตลอดจนการทดลองสินค้า แนะนำสินค้าและบริการของบริษัทฯ ให้กับลูกค้าปัจจุบันและลูกค้าใหม่ มีหน้าที่ในการให้ข้อมูลเกี่ยวกับผลิตภัณฑ์ของแบรนด์ให้แก่ลูกค้าที่มาใช้บริการ สาธิตการใช้สินค้าให้กับลูกค้าที่สนใจ และสร้างภาพลักษณ์ของแบรด์ให้แก่ลูกค้า ทำการขายสินค้า ตรวจเช็คสต็อกสินค้า และประสานงานกับหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง อัพเดตยอดขายระหว่างวัน, ยอดขายประจำวัน และทำยอดขายให้ได้ตามเป้าที่กำหนด ดูแล ให้บริการลูกค้าตลอดการขาย จนเสร็จสิ้นการขาย สร้างความพึงพอใจ และดูแลรักษาความสัมพันธ์ที่ดีกับลูกค้า ประสานงานระหว่างห้างและบริษัทฯ คุณสมบัติ วุฒิการศึกษา ม.3 เป็นต้นไป มีทักษะด้านการขายทางด้าน skincare / Cosmetic อย่างน้อย 1 ปี  ถ้ามีประสบการณ์นวดหน้าจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีทักษะในการติดต่อสื่อสาร มีใจรักบริการ บุคลิกภาพดี/มนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี ขยัน ซื่อสัตย์ อดทน มีใจรักงานบริการ มีความรู้ความเชี่ยวชาญด้านการขาย มีทักษะเจรจาต่อรอง สามารถใช้งานคอมพิวเตอร์ได้พื้นฐาน เช่น Word, Excel, Internet

Job_Title: พนักงานขายสินค้าและแคชเชียร์ (Beauty Advisor) สาขาเดอะมอลล์บางกะปิ
Job_Description: รายละเอียดงาน : แนะนำและให้คำปรึกษาแก่ลูกค้าเกี่ยวสินค้าภายในร้านที่ตนรับผิดชอบ เพื่อให้ลูกค้าได้รับข้อมูลที่ถูกต้อง ให้ความช่วยเหลือและให้คำแนะนำลูกค้า เมื่อถูกถามและสามารถแก้ไขปัญหาให้กับลูกค้า เบื้องต้นได้ มีความเข้าใจในตัวสินค้าเป็นอย่างดี และสามารถถ่ายทอดข้อดีของสินค้าได้อย่างเหมาะสม ติดตามและเข้าใจรายการส่งเสริมการขายของบริษัท เพื่อนำเสนอลูกค้าสามารถอธิบายได้ชัดเจน ดูแลความเรียบร้อยของการจัดวางสินค้า เติมสินค้าบนพื้นที่ขาย ให้อยู่ในตำแหน่งที่เหมาะสมขึ้นพาโนแกรมอย่างถูกต้อง ดูแลสินค้ามิให้ขาดหรือสูญหาย ดูแล ตรวจนับสต็อคสินค้า ที่ตนเองรับผิดชอบอยู่เสมอ ดูแลรักษาความสะอาดในพื้นที่ที่รับผิดชอบ รวมถึงบริเวณข้างเคียง ให้สะอาดอย่างสม่ำเสมอ งานอื่นๆที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้จัดการสาขา/ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการสาขา คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร : วุฒิการศึกษา ม.3 ขึ้นไป เคยมีประสบการณ์การขายสินค้าในกลุ่มธุรกิจค้าปลีก หากเคยขายสินค้าประเภทเครื่องสำอาง สินค้าแฟชั่น จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถแก้ปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้เป็นอย่างดี สามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้เป็นอย่างดี มีพัฒนาทักษะด้านการสื่อสารให้มีความเป็นเลิศอย่างต่อเนื่องได้ มีความซื่อสัตย์ สุจริต และทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้ดี มีความสามารถด้านคอมพิวเตอร์เบื้องต้น เช่น Microsoft Office

Job_Title: Salesperson, Siam/Sathorn branch/พนักงานขายประจำร้าน สาขา สยาม/สาทร
Job_Description: ตำแหน่งพนักงานขายประจำร้าน สาขา สาทร (นาราธิวาสราชนครินทร์ ซอย 15 หัวมุมติดถนน ) / สยาม ซ.2 BTS สยาม - คอมมิชชั่นต่างหาก มีสวัสดิการ และโอกาสความก้าวหน้าในงานอย่างรวดเร็วที่จะได้รับการพิจารณาขึ้นเป็นรองผู้จัดการร้าน ผู้จัดการร้าน หัวหน้างานขาย ฯลฯ หากมีผลงานที่ดี - ช่วงเวลาการทำงาน 11.00-20.00 - เลือกวันหยุดเองได้ อาทิตย์ละ 1 วัน - เป็นร้านตัดเสื้อผู้ชาย เป็นงานขายเสื้อผ้าผู้ชาย - ขายสินค้า เปิดบิล แนะนำสินค้า รับออเดอร์ - ปรับเงินเดือนตามความสามารถ หากเรียนรู้ได้เร็วก็จะปรับเงินได้ไว สถานที่ทำงาน สยาม ซ 2 สาทร นาราธิวาส ราชนครินทร์ ซอย 15 หัวมุม, สาทร

Job_Title: พนักงานขายสินค้าและแคชเชียร์ (Beauty Advisor) สาขาระยอง (รับ 1 อัตรา)

Job_Title: F&B & Events Service Expert
Job_Description: POSITION SUMMARY Our jobs aren’t just about serving guests during a banquet or event. Instead, we want to build an experience that is memorable and unique. Our Guest Event Experts are skilled in a wide range of event functions with responsibility for making sure the event is well-executed from start to finish. Whether setting up or breaking down the materials, transporting supplies, taking orders, interacting with guests, or anything in between, the Guest Event Expert makes transactions feel like part of the experience. No matter what position you are in, there are a few things that are critical to success – creating a safe work place, following company policies and procedures, upholding quality standards, and ensuring your uniform, personal appearance, and communications are professional. Guest Service Experts will be on their feet and moving around (stand, sit, or walk for an extended time) and taking a hands-on approach to work (move, lift, carry, push, pull, and place objects weighing less than or equal to 25 pounds without assistance). Doing all these things well (and other reasonable job duties as requested) is critical for Guest Event Experts – to get it right for our guests and our business each and every time. Marriott International is an equal opportunity employer. We believe in hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive, people-first culture. We are committed to non-discrimination on any protected basis, such as disability and veteran status, or any other basis covered under applicable law. Job_Title: Head of Boutique
Job_Description: Key Responsibilities: Ensures team is motivated and understands Chanel vision and mission. Grows and develops boutique team members through the identification of their strengths/weaknesses and develop individual development plans for each team member. Identifies and implements ways to empower and inspire his or her team members to surpass the expectations of customers, so as to loyalise and build long lasting relationship with them. Communicates regularly to the boutique team to inspire them and reinforce the Chanel Difference . Coaches team members in partnership with Training and Product teams in product knowledge, ECS and sales techniques using tools and support provided. Agree with Retail Manager and/or Fashion General Manager on performance standards and conduct performance reviews every six month. Defines and adjusts manpower needs.  Work closely with ROM/HR in making hiring decisions and proactively help to find and retain talent. Work with Retail Manager and Head office to develop a Client-centric culture Champions customer engagement so as to develop long lasting relationships with key customers. Obtains a thorough and personalized understanding of every Elite Clients’ needs and expectations lifestyle, “as a person”.  Makes an effort to get to know every Elite Client in the boutique and Build a close rapport with them. Understands in general all customers’ needs and expectations, and drives the boutique team members to fulfill these needs and expectations as best as possible. Sets high standards in all aspects of customer service and drive the team to provide excellent services that can surpass customers’ expectations. At all times, ensures that service provided is in line with company standards. Proactively works with the Boutique team (or Training team where applicable) to address short-comings in customer service identified through Mystery Shopping surveys, client feedback or other indicators. Personally handles or sees that the boutique team members handle all customer service complaints and/or merchandise complaints effectively and according to guidelines. Ensures that CEM data on each customer is captured accurately and kept up-to-date. Work closely with the Retail Manager and/or Product teams to ensure that the boutique is stocked with an appropriate depth and width of merchandise. Encourages active participation from the boutique team during pre and post buy meetings, and mandate providing regular qualitative feedback on products to the Product Team. From a product strategy point of view, reinforces, in co-operation with the Product and Training teams, the inspiration of every collection and inspire the boutique team to have a positive mindset towards new products, ideas and inspirations. Inculcate a forward thinking mentality towards every collection. Drives sales on a daily / weekly / monthly basis for the team. Analyzes variance against sales targets and take appropriate actions. Agree with Retail Manager and/or Fashion General Manager on targets for telephone calls, appointments and follow up sessions for the team, and drives the boutique team to achieve these targets. Liaises closely with Fashion Management to ensure that the assortment and stock are at optimal levels to achieve targeted sales. Recommends incentive schemes to maximize Service +sales performance. Designs and reviews the boutique roster to maximize staff strength according to traffic demands and trading patterns. Ensures all operational procedures regarding sales, discounts, transfers, stock adjustments and all policies are followed. Liaise with other boutiques and Distribution Center and Merchandising Team to ensure a smooth and accurate transfer of stock when required. Ensures daily sales and appropriate paperwork is accurately completed. Reports on customer trends / demands, competitor activity and merchandise movement to Fashion Management on a regular basis. Form close partnerships with W&FJ Division, and the relevant divisions (IT, Finance, ODHR, Logistics, Communications) as well as within the Fashion division (VM, Marketing, Product, PR, Training) in order to best execute and achieve business objective. l role, with a proven track record of successfully managing large teams. Performing any additional tasks as assigned by the supervisor or management. Qualifications Holds a Bachelor's degree in business administration or a related field. Demonstrates substantial knowledge in luxury fashion retail. Brings over 10 years of managerial experience with a proven track record of effectively leading large teams. Capable of adhering to retail working hours, including weekends and public holidays. Proficient in gathering and communicating business and market trends, with the ability to understand and synthesize business and market intelligence. Possesses strong interpersonal skills, showcasing leadership qualities. Exhibits a strong customer service mindset and a comprehensive understanding of operational management. At Chanel, we are focused on creating an inclusive culture that nurtures personal growth, contributing to collective progress. We believe the uniqueness of each individual increases the diversity, complementarity and effectiveness of our teams. We strongly encourage your application, as we value the perspective, experience and potential you could bring to CHANEL.

3 to 5 Years Experience in hotel sales or Banquet sales or event sales with proven track record. - Bachelor Degree or Diploma in Hospitality or Sales and Marketing. - Proficient in using CRM, MS office software applications including MS office, Excel, Power point etc. Job Details รายละเอียดงาน - Receiving, handling and converting Meetings, Events and Group enquiries. - Planning events in conjunction with the client. - Presenting and Selling available and suitable banquet / event options to the highest possible standard. - Contact Meeting Planner by mail, telephone, customer outings and site inspections. - Arrange and carry out Hotel show rounds. - Ensure the complete administration and execution of all planned events. - Negotiate space, dates and rates to obtain booking goal while focusing on shoulder and off season business. - Identify need periods and undertake comprehensive program of sales activity to secure new and adhoc business minimizing the impact of low activity periods. - Assist in development and solicitation of Banquet and event package plans and aimed at conference business and encourage repeat business. - Attend trade and travel shows of various market area for promoting hotels event business. - Actively manage business bookings, record denials, make network referrals. - Make commercial decisions to maximize MICE income on a daily basis. - Continue professional development through educational offering made via industry trade groups and educational institutions. - Encouraging repeat business through excellent customer service and inquiry handling. - Build strong relationships with customers to fully understand their needs. - Ensure online meeting partner websites are regularly updated and managed including photos, descriptions, and promotions. - Each month review the next 6 months availability to highlight high or low demand dates and take steps to minimize the risk of any shortfall or overbooking. - Ensuring all inquiries are recorded accurately in the Event Enquiry application. - Bring in direct guests though online marketing and advertising. - Helping the hotel to identify new avenues of business and bring in more banquet events to the hotel. - Assist in the preparation and monitoring of sales, department and budgetary reports as and when required. - Other duties and tasks assigned by the management within the job scope. Job_Title: Stylist
Job_Description: JOB DESCRIPTION We believe that clothes — and how you make them — can make a difference. Since 1853, we’ve been obsessed with innovation to meet people’s needs. We invented the first blue jean. And we reinvented khaki pants. We pioneered labor and environmental guidelines for our manufacturing partners. And we work to build sustainability into everything we do. A company doesn’t last 160 years by standing still. It endures by reinventing itself, striving to delight its consumers, winning in the marketplace, and by remaining true to its values. We are looking for a Store Manager who will bring innovation, creativity and leadership to our team. It is important to us this person has the energy and desire to help bring our fashion to the future while maintaining the integrity of our brand’s past. The purpose of this position is to direct and lead superior retail strategies and execute store operation functions to deliver financial growth and sustained brand equity. Sales Stylist are responsible for implementing a variety of functions and procedures relating to customer service, sales, merchandising, and store operations. Key Responsibilities: Show a thorough understanding of Levi Strauss & Company’s history and heritage Demonstrate excellent product knowledge Provide exceptional customer service to every Levi’s® Store customer using The 3C’s of Success:Connect, Consult & Close Meet or exceed established store and individual sales and performance goals daily Comply with Levi’s® Stores cash handling guidelines Comply with store security, safety, and loss prevention programs Assist stock associates with replenishment and security tagging of merchandise on the selling floor as needed Assist in pricing of merchandise as needed Assist in maintaining store appearance in accordance with Levi’s®Stores visual presentation standards and general housekeeping procedures Rapid and accurate sales floor refill and replenishment through RFID-enabled inventory processes Basic technology skills – familiarity with iOS, basic device troubleshooting, read and understand technical training manuals Basic Qualifications: Ability to work a flexible schedule to meet the needs of the business, including evening and weekend shifts Ability to lift up to 40 pounds, as well as constant standing, walking, squatting, and bending Minimum 1 year of customer service experience preferred High school diploma or GED preferred Exhibits the following characteristics: Structured Organized Methodical Consistent Adaptable LOCATION Bangkok, Thailand FULL TIME/PART TIME Full time

Job_Description: Job ID: 135647 สาขา: โลตัสปทุมธานี ประเภทงาน: Part Time จังหวัด: ปทุมธานี เขต: เมืองปทุมธานี งาน Full Time ลักษณะงาน งานขายและงานบริการ คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร ชาย/หญิง อายุ 18ขึ้นไป วุฒิ ม. 3 ขึ้นไป ยิ้มแย้ม ชอบพูดคุยกับผู้คน มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดีและมีบุคลิกภาพดี ใจรักในงานบริการและงานขาย กระฉับกระเฉง คล่องแคล่วว่องไว ผลตอบแทนและสวัสดิการ รายได้เฉลี่ยเริ่มต้น 12,000 บาทและ bonus รางวัลพนักงานดีเด่นรายเดือน รายปี ค่าล่วงเวลา (OT) ค่าปิดร้าน ฟรีค่าชุดพนักงาน มีโอกาสเติบโตเป็นผู้จัดการร้าน ประกันสังคม กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ ประกันสุขภาพกลุ่ม - ค่ารักษาพยาบาลผู้ป่วยนอก15,000ต่อปี - วันลาพักร้อนประจำปี - วันลาแทนวันหยุดตามประเพณี - ทุนการศึกษา งาน Part Time ลักษณะงาน: งานขายและงานบริการ คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร ชาย/หญิง อายุ 18ขึ้นไป วุฒิ ม. 3 ขึ้นไป ยิ้มแย้ม ชอบพูดคุยกับผู้คน มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดีและมีบุคลิกภาพดี ใจรักในงานบริการและงานขาย กระฉับกระเฉง คล่องแคล่วว่องไว ผลตอบแทนและสวัสดิการ อัตราจ้างรายชั่วโมง ตั้งแต่ 42-60 บาท เลือกเวลาทำงานได้ รางวัลพนักงานดีเด่นรายเดือน รายปี ค่าล่วงเวลา (OT) วันหยุดนักขัตฤกษ์ 2 เท่า ฟรีค่าชุดพนักงาน
